text:
Britney Spears doing a split on the beach in Hawaii while on vacation with her family on July 24, 2015.

Greetings from Hawaii!

Britney Spears' 10 Best Music Videos

Britney Spears vacationed in Hawaii over the weekend. She posted some sunny photo highlights of her trip to Instagram, including some stunning bikini pictures. In a video, she’s cheering her sons on while they are waiting for the ocean’s waves to come by.

Britney Spears Wishes You a 'Happy Friday!' With Saucy Bikini Video

Check out the photos and video below.

Aloha Hawaii -- A photo posted by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 27, 2016 at 3:31pm PDT
